page.title: 11GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: British Bulldogs,Police Academy Tiger Hunt,Donkey Battles,Football,Two-balls. Marbles is very popular,played by two or more;whoever gets most marbles in the hole wins.If two marbles touch(a twosey)you aim to place one in the hole and the other out.Marbles have different values and names e.g beauty (4)dobber(6)oily(24)oner(l)twoer(2). Skipping is enjoyed by many-Skipping Songs -"high,low,medium,slow,dolly, rocker, pepper."Big Ben strikes again, close your eyes and count to ten l-l0. Double Dutch-A skipping game from America using two ropes which are turned together,clockwise and anti- clockwise;the idea is to try to skip fast so that you jump over both ropes. Indoor games played at home: Computer games,monopoly,hide and seek,enchanted forest,downfaqll, snooker,noughts and crosses,cluedo,connect 4,darts.
